main event: A civilian reported a sighting of several flashing objects moving from northwest to southeast over Arcanum, Ohio, on November 13, 1968.
interesting points: The observer noted that the objects appeared twice within a two to three minute period., The observer initially thought the light was part of low-hanging clouds that seemed to be parting., The report described the objects as similar to the reflection of a searchlight., The sighting lasted about 5 minutes and involved visual observation., The observer was accompanied by his wife during the sighting.
